content: Kang-Jin Loong is a required Yaoguai King (or rather Queen) miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Located upon the large lake of Mirrormere in Snowhill Path, she will be summoned to defend her master Goldenbrow, who holds the Sage's Relic you seek.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Kang-Jin_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Kang-Jin Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Kang-Jin Loong is a required Yaoguai King (or rather Queen) miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Located upon the large lake of Mirrormere in Snowhill Path, she will be summoned to defend her master Goldenbrow, who holds the Sage's Relic you seek.
